[docs]class DJMallAuthBackend(ModelBackend):
    """ 自定义用户验证，继承ModelBackend, 重写authenticate方法
    ModelBackend 类实际是django继承BaseBackend实现的验证登录后端，
    我们这里使用的是django自带的验证后端，那最好的做法就是扩展重写该类
    """

[docs]    def authenticate(self, request, username=None, password=None):
        # Check the username/password and return a user.
        try:
            user = User.objects.get(Q(username=username)|Q(email=username))
            if user.check_password(password):
                return user
        except User.DoesNotExist:
            return None

[docs]    def get_success_url(self) -> str:
        if self.request.GET.get('redirect_to'):
            self.success_url = self.request.GET['redirect_to']
            return self.success_url
        else:
            return '/'
